item.title: Lecture 6 : Input Devices and Interaction Paradigms
item.description: Presenting and classifying a new/failed input device/technique While browsing the internet to find a new type of input device I came across what i first thought to be an atrocity. Meet the OrbiTouch, the keyless mouse and keyboard As the description suggests, the OrbiTouch acts as a keyboard and mouse. You could argue that it might me a gesture driven interface but I’ll leave it as a GUI.
